entry.title: Clandestine
entry.summary:
Author: lulustars28

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,246Chapters: 9/?Kudos: 25

Summary: Jason Todd has only wanted one thing since he ended his revenge fueled rampage years ago and that was to rejoin his family. Only issue was everyone but the big man himself could forgive, till Jason is presented with an opportunity! An undercover mission in his Red Hood Mantel to gather intel on one of Batman’s toughest villains Blackmask. Seems easy enough until she gets involved.Y/N has only ever wanted one thing to get out of Gotham, unfortunately that would require money that she doesn’t have. Things become more difficult when a friend of hers gets put in a tough situation. While working at Blackmasks club, he gives her an opportunity. Keep eyes on his newest employee the Red Hood and become his weakness and in return he will give her enough money to get her and her best friend Peach out of Gotham. Y/N see’s this opportunity and is fully prepared to take on this challenge… but things become difficult when feelings get involved and she finds herself starting to fall for the guy in the red mask. Y/N must decide what’s most important to her, betraying the man she has come to love or getting the opportunity she has worked so hard towards.

entry.title: Follow The Leader
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,067Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 45

Summary: You were no hero nor vigilante, but you played your own role, assisting those who lived on the streets just like yourself. You would occasionally take on a dirty job of some description, whether that was a drug run, a stint in a brothel, whatever it took to get your hands on money. Then, you’d take your cut, disappear a while, and go around Gotham offering food, water, warm blankets, and other necessities to those who needed them. Children, adults, dirty, clean, old, young, didn’t matter to you. If they needed help, they got it. When some thugs come for revenge for a drug run gone wrong, you are saved by the Red Hood. But, as you are a criminal yourself, you are terrified of what he might do to you. He wants to show you he has no intention to hurt you.

entry.title: A Secret in Your Throat
entry.summary:
Author: lushescape

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,158Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 57

Summary: “Are you really that scared of a little blood? ‘m not even bleedin’ that much.” Jason asks through the door. It hurts worse because he doesn’t even sound like he’s teasing you like he normally would be. Instead he sounds worried, like he feels bad for making you feel uncomfortable. “It–” fuck you hate lying to Jason, “it just makes me really… nauseous.” The lie slips out clumsily, like you haven’t used it a million and one times before. “Nauseous?” Jason echoes back like he doesn’t really believe you, or maybe he just can’t hear you through the door. “Yeah. Nauseous. My uh.. stomach starts to hurt an’ –... an’ my mouth starts watering like I’m gonna–” you cut yourself off to swallow the pool of saliva that’s already forming in your mouth. “Like you’re gonna vomit?” Jason tries to finish your sentence for you. ‘No, like I’m going to sink my teeth into you and feed until I’m satiated and you’re delirious from blood loss.’ you think to yourself. Or Jason and his vampire boyfriend have a heart to heart about secrets.

entry.title: Baby’s First Creature-Feature
entry.summary:
Author: TheGoldenPath

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 19,044Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 23

Summary: She’s reading to him, a generator manual that looks well read. The pages are yellow and water stained around her long fingers. His vision lazily trails from the book to his bloodied sheets and back to the stranger. Is he hallucinating a comforting presence to make his reality less burdensome? When had his visions ever been pleasant?A pretty girl to sit by his bedside and comfort him in his death. It reminds him of the soft moments of peace in his childhood that he held onto with a white knuckled grip. It reminds him of the few moments his mother felt like a mother. He tries to reach out and touch her hand, just to see if she’s a fantasy meant to remind him of everything he never fully had only for the pain to jolt up his entire abdomen. That works too. He manages to stifle the pained groan that wants to shoot out from the simple motion.   Lightly inspired by the myth of Circe in the odyssey. (Lightly)
